abstract:
In this paper, the definition adjoint of the operator on fuzzy normed linear
spaces is introduced. It is shown that if (X, ) and ( , )
~
Y are two fuzzy
normed linear spaces and T : X Y be a strongly (weakly) fuzzy bounded
linear operator, then * * * T :Y X (adjoint of T ) is strongly ( weakly) fuzzy
bounded linear operator and * * *
  T  T , for each  (0,1].
